name: T-Wrecks (vishwah13)
description:
This game is made for Score Space Jam #14.

IMPORTANT

Please play on Full Screen mode,the button will be on bottom right.

Controls:
Use mouse to aim and left click to shoot.
A,D to move left and right,Space to jump

HOW IT FITS THE THEME:

The Theme is MERGING.

The player needs to use the ball to defend him self form enemies.the player alone can't do anything to defend him.

Credits:

Programming and SFX, by me.

Music:https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/28358/

Dino Art:https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters.

TileSet and Enemy: https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/
